name: Full-Stack Development
description: Experience in Full-Stack Development with Laravel, Node.js, React, and Vue. Proficiency in SQL and relational database design (MySQL), understanding of NoSQL concepts and data modeling. Comfortable with frontend frameworks such as Vue.js, React, Nuxt.js, and Next.js.

name: API & Backend Architecture
description: Experience in REST API design and backend architecture. Adept at system maintenance, production deployment, and server configuration (Linux, Apache/Nginx). Experience with real-time systems using WebSockets.

name: DevOps & Deployment
description: Familiarity with Docker and containerized deployment environments. Deploy applications using Ubuntu, Apache2, and Docker-based environments. Serverless architecture (Node.js) deployment experience.

name: Web3 & Blockchain
description: Familiar with Web3 development including Smart Contracts (ERC-20) and NFT marketplace architecture. Understanding of Blockchain fundamentals (Proof-of-Work, digital signatures, transaction validation).

name: AI & Testing
description: Basic knowledge of Machine Learning. Experience developing AI nodes for workflow automation systems. Implemented unit testing, feature testing, and end-to-end (E2E) testing to ensure system reliability.
